name: Immune System "Engineer" - Can you Delay the Inevitable Skin Breach?
name_original: Immune System "Engineer" - Can you Delay the Inevitable Skin Breach?
description:
Controls: 

  • *SPACE BAR to Pause
  • Click and Drag  from one Circle to another to create a connection
  • Connections must be made between matching colors
  • Connections cannot be made between nodes on the same Cell

Tutorial (also in game)

Welcome, to your first day as an Immune System Engineer in the Skin Division of the Aarimous Corpse!!

As an Immune System Engineer it’s your job to fend off the millions if not billions of pathogens, viruses, and bacteria that are trying to kill the almighty Aarimous. Well at least for as long as you can, INEVITABLY you will lose and we will need to replace you…

But for now.. DELAY the INEVITABLE skin breach as long as possible by SATISFYING as many cells as possible. Good Luck and thanks for choosing to work in the Skin Division!

If a cell reaches the top of the screen with open connections you will lose a heart. No Hearts = Game Over. Keep your health topped off by satisfying health cells.

hint: they have hearts on them

SATISFY: Click and Drag from one cell's NODE (colored circle) to another cell’s NODE. Note: the colors must match (I added shapes for out color blind friends)
